lines.text: And so to the end of history, murder shall breed murder, always in the name of right, and justice, and peace, until the gods create a race of men that can understand.
Go, Ptolemy. Always take a throne when it is offered to you.
When a stupid man is doing something he is ashamed of, he always declares it his duty.
You're bald! That's why you wear the wreath!
Is it sweet or bitter to be a queen?
Cast out fear, and you will conquer Caeser.
